bulkGetBillingNotificationsErrorResponse.title: Bulk Get Billing Notifications Error Response

AdPaymentsEntityMarketplace.description: Represents an advertiser and marketplace combination.

code.description: The code describing the error reason.

details.description: A human-readable description of the response.

AdPaymentsCreditCardPaymentMethod.description: Represents Credit Card payment method structure.

brand.description: The processor used to execute payments on the card, such as Visa, MasterCard, etc. Only valued for credit card payment methods.

instrumentId.description: Identifies a credit card payment method.

tail.description: The last four digits of the credit card number.

billingParty.description: Choose `AGENCY` if you are an agency representing an advertiser. Choose `BRAND_OWNER` if you are advertising for your product's sales

isBillTo.description: Whether the billingProfile created should be used for invoicing, taxation and other billing workflows. If the `billTo=false` is setthe `billingName` of that profile is used to determine the 'Advertiser Name' shown to consumers.To ensure accuracy of the information shown on the store, we request that you review the ‘Advertiser Name’ and ‘Payer Name’ in our ad systems and update them if required

CreateBillingProfile.description: Object encapsulating information for creating a billing profile

AdPaymentsDirectDebitPaymentMethodList.description: A list of direct debit payment methods.

GetBillingProfilesResponse.description: Paginated list of billing profile(s) response.

maxResults.description: Max results / billing profile(s) to be shown in a single page.

nextToken.description: Offset to fetch next page with list of billing profile(s).

AdPaymentsDeductFromPaymentPaymentMethod.description: Represents DeductFromPayment payment method structure. DeductFromPayment is a type of payment method where spends are deducted from vendor balance of a particular vendor code.

vendorCode.description: A vendor code identifies a product being sold by a vendor on the retail website. When Amazon purchases products from a vendor, Amazon owes the vendor money which gets added to the vendor''s balance. An advertising account can then use this balance to pay for their advertising spends.

vendorCodeName.description: The name of the vendor code this payment method represents.

vendorGroupId.description: The identifier of the vendor group that this vendor code belongs to.

BillingInvoiceSummariesRequest.description: Payload with filter, sort and aggregate key(s) to fetch list of billing invoice summary(s).

aggregation.description: Object encapsulating the aggregation query information

attribute.description: Aggregation attribute for the billing invoice summary(s)

groupBy.description: Aggregation bucket for the billing invoice summary(s)

operation.description: Aggregate operation for the billing invoice summary(s)

countryValueFilter.description: Object encapsulating the country filtering information

include.description: List of country value(s) to filter from the list of billing invoice summary(s).

queryTermMatchType.description: Defines how would the string resource field be matched with the query term in filter.

invoiceDueDateRangeFilter.description: Object encapsulating due date range information

endDate.description: The ending due date (inclusive) of the date range for filtering invoices. Please provide the date in ISO-8601 format, representing a UTC date with only the date portion (no time).

startDate.description: The starting due date (inclusive) of the date range for filtering invoices. Please provide the date in ISO-8601 format, representing a UTC date with only the date portion (no time).

invoiceIssuedDateRangeFilter.description: Object encapsulating issued date range information

endDate.description: The ending issued date (inclusive) of the date range for filtering invoices. Please provide the date in ISO-8601 format, representing a UTC date with only the date portion (no time).

startDate.description: The starting issued date (inclusive) of the date range for filtering invoices. Please provide the date in ISO-8601 format, representing a UTC date with only the date portion (no time).

invoiceNumberFilter.description: Object encapsulating the invoice number search information

include.description: List of invoice number(s) to filter from the list of billing invoice summary(s).

maxResults.description: Max results / billing invoice summary(s) to be shown in a single page.

nextToken.description: Offset to fetch next page with list of billing invoice summary(s).

paymentMethodTypeValueFilter.description: Object encapsulating the payment method type filtering information against which invoice is issued

include.description: List of payment method type value(s) to filter from the list of billing invoice summary(s).

queryTermMatchType.description: Defines how would the string resource field be matched with the query term in filter.

reserveOrderNumberFilter.description: Object encapsulating the reserve order number search information

include.description: List of reserve order number(s) to filter from the list of billing invoice summary(s).

sort.description: Object encapsulating the sort operation information

attribute.description: Sort key or attribute for the list of billing invoice summary(s)

direction.description: Sort order(ascending or descending) for list of billing invoice summary(s)

statusValueFilter.description: Object encapsulating the invoice status filtering information

include.description: List of invoice status value(s) to filter from the list of billing invoice summary(s).

queryTermMatchType.description: Defines how would the string resource field be matched with the query term in filter.

AdPaymentsCreatePaymentAgreementsOutput.description: Represent the output of the create payment agreement API.

AdPaymentsPayByInvoicePaymentMethod.description: Represents Pay By Invoice payment method structure. Pay By Invoice is a type of payment method where the customer receives a physical invoice which they can pay via bank transfer.

governmentInvoiceInformation.description: Government invoice data is provided in marketplaces (such as Italy or India) that require a government-assigned invoice ID. This object contains this identifier, along with the type of transaction (which will always be a debit in the case of an invoice) and presigned url link to download e-invoice document with expiry time of 45 sec.

governmentDocumentS3Link.description: PreSigned URL to grant time-limited download access for govt invoice pdf

governmentXmlDocumentS3Link.description: PreSigned URL to grant time-limited download access for govt invoice XML

governmentInvoiceInformation.title: Government Invoice Information

AdPaymentsPaymentAgreement.description: Represents an agreement between two parties indicating what profile to use during payment execution.

paymentAgreementId.description: The ID associated to this payment agreement.

bulkGetBillingStatusesRequestBody.description: The properties needed to get the billing statuses for a set of advertisers.
bulkGetBillingStatusesRequestBody.title: Bulk Get Billing Statuses Request Body

AdPaymentsDeductFromPaymentPaymentMethod.description: A list of deduct from payment payment methods.

GetBillingProfilesRequest.description: Payload to fetch list of billing profile(s).

filters.description: Filter object to be used to fetch list of billing profile(s).

billingProfileIdFilter.description: Indicates list of billing profile identifier(s) for which billing profile(s) needs to be fetched.

defaultBillingProfileFilter.description: Indicates if default billing profile needs to be fetched.

maxResults.description: Max results / billing profile(s) to be shown in a single page.

nextToken.description: Offset to fetch next page with list of billing profile(s).

entityId.description: The ID associated to the entity in this target.

bulkGetBillingStatusErrorCodes.title: Bulk Get Billing Status Error Codes

AdPaymentsCreditCardPaymentMethodList.description: A list of credit card payment methods.

AdPaymentsCreatePaymentAgreementsInput.description: Represents the input of the create payment agreement API.

CreateOrUpdateBillingProfilesResponse.description: Contains a list of one or more responses corresponding to each billing profile along with index.

billingProfiles.description: Segregated list of success and error responses for each billing profile in request payload.

error.description: List of error responses for each billing profile in request payload.

billingProfileId.description: Billing profile identifier corresponding to a billing profile in request payload.

errors.description: List of errors for a particular billing profile in request payload.

index.description: Indicates the index of a billing profile in request payload.

success.description: List of success responses for each billing profile in request payload.

billingProfileId.description: Billing profile identifier corresponding to a billing profile in the list.

index.description: Indicates the index of billing profile in the list of request payload.

bulkGetBillingNotificationsErrorCodes.title: Bulk Get Billing Notifications Error Codes

GetBillingProfileUsageRequest.description: The request body to fetch billing profiles linked to each country of global ads account.

expandBillingProfile.description: By default only the billingProfileId linked to the country will be returned. Choose `true` if you would like to see the content of the billing profiles linked to a country

expandFallbackBillingProfile.description: Choose `true` if you would like to see the information currently being used for billing for this marketplace. Useful when the billingProfileUsage status is not `OK` and the billing information coundn't be propagated for that country. If set to `true`, `fallbackBillingProfiles` attribute will be returned.

filters.description: Filter object to be used to fetch list of billing profile usage(s).

advertiserFilter.description: Indicates list of advertiser identifiers(s) for which billing profile(s) needs to be fetched.

maxResults.description: Max results / billing profile usage(s) to be shown in a single page.

nextToken.description: Offset to fetch next page with list of billing profile usage(s).

downloadableDocuments.description: List of downloadable documents associated with this invoice and accessible from the advertising console.

purchaseOrderNumber.title: Sponsored Ads only. Account-level purchase order number.

AdPaymentsGetPaymentAgreementOutput.description: Represent the output of the get payment agreements API.

invoiceLines.description: Line items for this invoice. For Sponsored Ads, this will be a per-campaign breakdown of charges. For DSP, this will be the line items for the campaign getting invoiced.
invoiceLines.title: Invoice Lines

AdPaymentsCreatePaymentProfileInput.description: Represents the input of the create payment profiles API.

BillingInvoiceSummary.description: Object encapsulating billing invoice summary information

amountDue.description: Object identifies the amount due along with currency code for the invoice

country.description: Object encapsulating billing invoice country information

dueDate.description: Invoice due date in ISO-8601 format, representing a UTC date with only the date portion (no time)

ePaymentStatus.description: Object encapsulating e-payment status for the invoice

code.description: e-payment status code for the invoice

issuedDate.description: Invoice issued date in ISO-8601 format, representing a UTC date with only the date portion (no time)

paymentMethodType.description: Object encapsulating payment method type against which invoice is issued

code.description: Payment method type for the invoice code

value.description: Payment method type for the invoice

refundDetails.description: Object encapsulating the invoice refund information

amount.description: Object identifies the refunded amount along with currency code for the invoice

remainingAmountDue.description: Object identifies the remaining amount due along with currency code for the invoice

status.description: Object encapsulating billing invoice summary status information

statusDecorator.description: Object encapsulating billing invoice summary status decorator information

InternalServerExceptionResponseContent.description: Thrown when service encounters unexpected error during processing of request.

description.example: The credit card associated with your billing account in 5 countries has expired. To continue advertising without interruption, update your credit card information in payment settings.

invoiceStatus.description:
* `ISSUED`: An invoice is issued when its charges are finalized and tax is computed on the total amount. 
* `PAID_IN_PART`: When a partial payment is received, the invoice status will change to paid in part.
* `PAID_IN_PART`: One full payment has been received, the invoice will be paid in full.
* `WRITTEN_OFF`: If an invoice is written off because of an error, the status will be updated to written off.
invoiceStatus.title: Invoice Status

content.description: An HTML document to be rendered and read. A consent needs to be provided against this content.

ApplyBillingProfileResponse.description: Contains a list of one or more responses corresponding to each advertiser and applied billing profile(s).

billingProfileUsages.description: Segregated list of success and error responses for each country and applied billing profile(s).

error.description: Error responses for each country and applied billing profile.

billingProfileIds.description: List of billing profile identifiers corresponding to billing profiles in request payload.

errors.description: Indicates the error occurred for a billing profile apply operation.

index.description: Index corresponding to index of the apply operation in request

success.description: Success responses for each country and applied billing profile(s).

billingProfileIds.description: List of billing profile identifiers corresponding to billing profiles in request payload.

index.description: Index corresponding to index of the apply operation in request

BillingProfileErrorResponse.description: Contains the machine-readable error code and human-readable details.

code.description: The code describing the error reason.

details.description: A human-readable description of the response.

adjustments.description: List of adjustments (positive and negative) applied to this invoice.
adjustments.title: Adjustments

additionalProperties.description: The key-value pair for the campaign tag.

campaignTags.description: Campaign tags in the form of string key-value pairs.
campaignTags.title: Campaign Tags

costEventType.description: Type of event charged (clicks or impressions)
costEventType.title: Cost Event Type

costPerEventType.description: Ad spends cost (Cost exclusive of adjustments/promotions/fees/etc) per unit (thousand impressions/clicks).
costPerEventType.title: Cost Per Event Type

fees.description: Charges can include different fees (see feeType below).
fees.title: Fees

portfolioId.description: Sponsored Ads only. This identifier maps to one of the portfolios listed in the portfolios section.
portfolioId.title: Portfolio ID

purchaseOrderNumber.title: DSP only. Campaign-level purchase order number.

CreateBillingProfilesRequest.description: Contains a list of one or more billing profiles to be created.

bulkGetBillingStatusErrorResponse.title: Bulk Get Billing Status Error Response

ApplyBillingProfileRequest.description: Request with a list of advertisers to which a list of billing profiles needs to be applied.

billingProfileUsages.description: List of advertisers to which a list of billing profiles needs to be applied.

billingProfileIds.description: List of billing profile identifiers which needs to be associated with an advertiser.

countryCodes.description: List of countries for which billing statements are to be fetched. If no country codes are passed in the request, the statement will be generated for all the advertising countries by default.

endDate.description: End date of the invoice summary period for a report in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

format.description: Format of the file, such as, for billing statements, etc.

locale.description:
Preferred locale can be chosen among the list of valid language codes. Check the table below for supported language code.

**Supported Locales Table**
Locale code Language
en_US English
ja_JP Japanese
ar_SA Arabic
de_DE German
fr_FR French
it_IT Italian
es_MX Spanish
nl_NL Dutch
sv_SE Swedish
pl_PL Polish
tr_TR Turkish
pt_BR Portuguese

startDate.description: Start date of the invoice summary period for a report in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

id.description: The identifier of the resource that this result is referencing.

index.description: The index of the item in the input list.

reason.description: A human readable reason giving more details regarding this result.

AdPaymentsGetCustomerPaymentMethodsOutpu.description: Represents the output of the get payment methods API.

AdPaymentsSellerPayablePaymentMethodList.description: A list of seller payable payment methods.

BaseBillingProfile.description: Billing profile object which contains details regarding address, tax, etc.

address.description: Address details to be used for a billing profile

billingName.description: The name of the person or organization who is going to recieve the invoice

contactName.description: Contact name for the billing profile which will also be printed on the invoice.

agreements.description: List of tax-type and corresponding details.

consent.description: Consent on the provided agreement document.

documentName.description:
Agreement document name against which consent needs to be provided. The content of the agreement can be checked by providing agreement name in `POST /billingProfileAgreementContents/{billingProfileAgreementContentId}` API. Check following table for supported values:

**Supported Agreement Document Names**
Agreement document nameDescription
BILLING_PROFILE_TAX_AGREEMENT Global tax agreement. Advertiser needs to consent to this if they provide taxes in the billing profile
BILLING_PROFILE_CANADIAN_NON_RESIDENCY_AGREEMENT If advetiser is non-resident of canada and wants to advertise in canada without providing canada GST, they need to consent to this agreement
BILLING_PROFILE_DSA_AGREEMENTRelevant for Authors, If you choose to display your BILLING_NAME or any name other than “Author” then you must provide consent for BILLING_PROFILE_DSA_AGREEMENT.

billingProfileName.description: Name of a billing profile. This name will only be used to identify the billing profile and will not be used for billing. This is for the client to organize the billing profiles and doesn't affect the billing process.

displayInfo.description: Object determines publicly displayed information about the advertiser

displayName.description: Relevant for only authors. Required if author chooses displayNameField as DISPLAY_NAME.The value inside this field will be shown publicly.

displayNameField.description: Determines the name field that will be displayed publicly.For non-authors, the default and only allowed value for this is BILLING_NAME. For author accounts, If BILLING_NAME is chosen then the value inside address.billingName will bedisplayed publicly. If DISPLAY_NAME is chosen then the value inside displayInfo.displayName will beshown publicly. You may choose to display “Author” as your displayName or you may provide an alternatename to display for your ads.

holdingCompany.description:
Type of holding company for agency billing profile. Agency Holding Companies are conglomerate entities that own multiple smaller advertising agencies. There are six holding companies, WPP, Omnicom, Publicis, Interpublic, Dentsu, and Havas. A holding company is provided if the billing party is an agency. If your agency is not associated with any of the above, choose NO_HOLDING_COMPANY Check following table for supported values:

**Supported Holding Company**
Holding Company
NO_HOLDING_COMPANY
WPP
OMNICOM
PUBLICIS_GROUPE
INTERPUBLIC
DENTSU
HAVAS

isDefault.description: Attribute to indicate if a billing profile is default or not under that global account. Once marked as default, for new countries this billing profile will get automatically applied, if all information provided are sufficient

purchaseOrderNumber.description: Number to track spend against the budgeted amounts.

countryCode.description: Code of the country to which the tax value belongs to which would override the countryCode provided in the address.

type.description:
Type of tax. Check following table for supported tax types:

**Supported Tax Types**
Tax Type
VAT
GST
RFC
SDI
PEC
CNPJ
TAX_OFFICE
TAX_REGIME
PAN


Check following table for supported values for TAX_REGIME:

**Supported Tax (for TAX_REGIME) Values**
Value Description
601General de Ley Personas Morales
603Personas Morales con Fines no Lucrativos
605Sueldos y Salarios e Ingresos Asimilados a Salarios
606Arrendamiento
607Régimen de Enajenación o Adquisición de Bienes
608Demás ingresos
610Residentes en el Extranjero sin Establecimiento Permanente en México
611Ingresos por Dividendos (socios y accionistas)
612Personas Físicas con Actividades Empresariales y Profesionales
614Ingresos por intereses
615Régimen de los ingresos Ingresos por obtención de premios
616Sin obligaciones fiscales
620Sociedades Cooperativas de Producción que optan por diferir sus ingresos
621Incorporación Fiscal
622Actividades Agrícolas, Ganaderas, Silvícolas y Pesqueras
623Opcional para Grupos de Sociedades
624Coordinados
625Régimen de las Actividades Empresariales con ingresos a través de Plataformas Tecnológicas
626Régimen Simplificado de Confianza

value.description: Value of the tax type. For example, VAT number for VAT tax type, etc.

CurrencyAmount.description: Identifies the amount along with currency code.

feeIdentifiers.description:
Identifiers describing attributes for different fee types.
* countryCode: ISO 3611 country code for country specific Regulatory Advertising Fees.
feeIdentifiers.title: Fee Identifiers

feeType.description:
* `PLATFORM_FEE`: Billable fee set at the Rodeo Entity level by internal users which reflects the cost of using the Amazon DSP
  * Supply Cost * Platform Fee %
* `AGENCY_FEE`: Non-billable fee set at the Rodeo Order level by external users which reflects the fee that the agency is charging the end customer
  * Total Cost * Agency Fee %
* `AUDIENCE_FEE`: Billable fee automatically calculated at the Rodeo Line Item level when external users choose Amazon 1P data segments for campaign targeting
  * Impressions with Audience Fees * Audience Fee (CPM)/1000
* `3P_[AUTO_]NON_ABSORBED_FEE`: Billable fee automatically calculated at the Rodeo Line Item level when external users choose Automotive data segments and/or DMP data segments for campaign targeting
  * Impressions * Billable 3p Fee / 1000
* `REGULATORY_ADVERTISING_FEE`: Fees derive from ads serving in specific countries and/or for ads purchased from advertisers in specific countries during the period in which you are billed.
* `OMNICHANNEL_METRICS_FEE`: Billable fee set at DSP order level by internal users, which reflects the cost of using Omnichannel metrics measurement
  * Supply Cost * Omnichannel Metrics Fee %
* `3P_PREBID_FEE`: Billable fee automatically calculated when external users choose third party prebid targeting products for supply quality filtering.
  * Impressions with 3P Prebid Fees * 3P Prebid Fee (CPM)/1000 %
* `REWARDED_ADS_COST`: Billable, non taxable cost calculated for the rewards distributed when external users choose Rewarded Ads creative template for campaign targeting

AdPaymentsIdempotenceId.description: Idempotency Id that will be used as a identifier to ensure idempotency while creating /updating the given resource. Requests with same idempotency Id will be considered identical and processed in an idempotent manner.

reason.description: Provides additional details and reason for the payment status

ErrorResponse.description: Contains the machine-readable error code and human-readable details.

errorCode.description: The code describing the error reason.

errorMessage.description: A human-readable description of the response.

portfolios.description: Sponsored Ads only. This is a list of portfolios with their name, ID and the total cost of the campaign(s) they contain. This totalAmount corresponds to the sum of the invoice lines tagged with the ID of this portfolio.
portfolios.title: Portfolios

AdPaymentsPayByInvoicePaymentMethodList.description: A list of pay by invoice payment methods.

payments.description: List of payments made against the invoice.
payments.title: Payments

AdPaymentsEntityMarketplaceList.description: A list of uniquely identifiable advertising entities.

GetBillingProfileUsageResponse.description: Contains billing profile usages: list of advertisers and applied billing profile.

maxResults.description: Max results / billing profile usage(s) to be shown in a single page.

nextToken.description: Indicates the pagination token to be used to access next page.

details.description: The human-readable description of the response.

reportStatus.description: The request status of the billing statement.

s3DownloadLink.description: Download link of the billing statement file. Only when reportStatus is SUCCESS.

billingAggregationId.description: An identifier that helps associate this invoice with specific billing entities, such as campaigns or rodeo advertiser accounts.

billingAggregationResourcePath.description: The resource path to suffix to the base URL endpoints to retrieve the corresponding billing aggregation entity, such as a specific campaign or all active campaigns under DSP Rodeo Advertiser. An example URL after suffixing will be 'https://advertising-api.amazon.com/dsp/orders/123'. The base URL endpoints for the different regions and marketplaces can be found in the Amazon Advertising API Reference Portal.

permanentAccountNumber.description: **IN only** field that represents the tax account number of the billed entity entered on AMS portal.
permanentAccountNumber.title: Permanent Account Number

taxBreakups.description: List of taxes applied on the transaction for this invoice.
taxBreakups.title: TaxBreakups

issuerJurisdiction.description: Tax jurisdiction of issuer (Amazon billing entity)
issuerJurisdiction.title: Issuer Jurisdiction

taxId.description: Tax registration with government (Ex: VAT ID, GST ID)
taxId.title: Tax ID

taxId.description: Tax registration with government (Ex: VAT ID, GST ID)
taxId.title: Tax ID

taxedJurisdictionName.description: Tax jurisdiction for which tax applies, this can be at the country, state or local level.
taxedJurisdictionName.title: Taxed Jurisdiction Name

taxId.description: Tax registration with government (Ex: VAT ID, GST ID)
taxId.title: Tax ID

AdPaymentsPayInvoicesInput.description: Represents the input to the pay invoices API.

ResourceNotFoundExceptionResponseContent.description: Request references a resource which does not exist.

adProgram.description: Sponsored Ads only. This field indicates the ad type (such as Sponsored Products, Sponsored Brands or Sponsored Display).
adProgram.title: Program Name

AdPaymentsDirectDebitPaymentMethod.description: Represents Direct Debit payment method structure.

instrumentId.description: Identifies a direct debit payment method.

tail.description: The last four digits of the bank account number.

BillingProfileUsage.description: This object contains billing profile(s) that is applied to a given country under a global account

billingLevel.description:
Configured on the Rodeo portal and only applicable to ADSP-SS, this flag reflects the basis on which campaigns are consolidated. Possible values include:
- 'CAMPAIGN': Billing is based on individual campaigns. 
- 'ACCOUNT': Billing is based on the Rodeo DSP advertiser account.

ValidationExceptionResponseContent.description: The input fails to satisfy the constraints specified by an Advertising API service.

DocType.description:
Supported type of billing document to be specified through query parameter. 
Prepayment Receipts do not share the same documentId as the other DocTypes and must be requested separately.

UpdateBillingProfilesRequest.description: Contains a list of one or more billing profiles to be updated.

AdPaymentsExpiryDetails.description: Indicates the month a payment method will expire.

month.description: The month the payment method will expire.

year.description: The year the payment method will expire.

AdPaymentsPaymentAgreementId.description: ID of a payment agreement that must belong to the customer. A one-time payment will be collected using the payment agreement's associated payment profile. If not provided, the latest payment agreement of the advertiser will be used to collect payments.

billingProfileId.description: Billing profile identifier which will be used to identify a billing profile. This identifier will NOT affect billing process.

UpdateBillingProfile.description: Object encapsulating information for updating a billing profile

BillingInvoiceSummariesResponse.description: Contains an object encapsulating either the aggregation result(s) or sorted & filtered billing invoice summary(s).

aggregation.description: Object encapsulating the aggregation query and result(s) information

invoiceSummaries.description: List of object(s) encapsulating information of billing invoice summary(s).

results.description: Object encapsulating the aggregation result as per aggregation attribute, operation and bucket (or groupById) on the list of billing invoice summary(s).

items.description: Object encapsulating the aggregation result as per aggregation attribute, operation and bucket (or groupById) on the list of billing invoice summary(s).

currencyCode.description: Currency of the aggregate value over the aggregation bucket for a certain key on the aggregation attribute for the specified aggregation operation.

groupId.description: Aggregation bucket key (or groupById) to which the specific aggregation result belongs.

value.description: Aggregate value over the aggregation bucket for a certain key on the aggregation attribute for the specified aggregation operation.

nextToken.description: Offset to fetch next page with list of billing invoice summary(s).

AdPaymentsNextToken.description: To retrieve the next page of results, call the same operation and specify this token in the request. If the nextToken field is empty, there are no further results.

displayName.description: Customer name used in email communication.
displayName.title: Display Name

promotions.description: List of promotions applied to the charges in this invoice.
promotions.title: Promotions

AdPaymentsPaymentProfile.description: Represents a list of payment methods and the scope of advertisers able to access them.

paymentProfileId.description: The ID associated to this payment profile.

AdPaymentsPaymentResult.description: Represents the result of a payment execution.

invoiceCFID.description: The customer facing ID of the invoice.

reason.description: A human-readable reason explaining the payment result.

billingParty.description: Choose `AGENCY` if you are an agency representing an advertiser. Choose `BRAND_OWNER` if you are advertising for your product's sales.

billingProfileId.description: Billing profile identifier which will be used to identify a billing profile. This identifier will NOT affect billing process.

isBillTo.description: Whether the billingProfile created should be used for invoicing, taxation and other billing workflows. If the `billTo=false` is setthe `billingName` of that profile is used to determine the 'Advertiser Name' shown to consumers.To ensure accuracy of the information shown on the store, we request that you review the ‘Advertiser Name’ and ‘Payer Name’ in our ad systems and update them if required

BillingProfile.description: Billing profile object which contains details regarding address, tax, etc.

fees.description: Charges can include different fees (see feeType below).
fees.title: Fees

portfolioId.description: Sponsored Ads only. This identifier maps to one of the portfolios listed in the portfolios section.
portfolioId.title: Portfolio ID

BillingProfileStatus.description:
Current Status of the link between the billing Profile and the country. The following table defines the statuses and their descriptions.
Status Description
OK There is no problem with the billing profile usage
BILLING_PROFILE_INVALID_ADDRESS Billing profile usage has invalid address
BILLING_PROFILE_INVALID_TAX Billing profile usage has invalid taxes
BILLING_PROFILE_INVALID_PERMISSION User does not have the permission to view the billing profile
BILLING_PROFILE_NOT_FOUND No billing profile was linked to this country
BILLING_PROFILE_ERROR There is some other problem with the billing profile usage

details.description: A human-readable description of the response.

AdPaymentsCreatePaymentProfilesOutput.description: Represent the output of the create payment profiles API.

thirdPartyContactInformation.description: Additional contacts. This field is used in cases such as Loi Sapin in France where both advertiser and agency addresses need to be provided.
thirdPartyContactInformation.title: Third Party Contact Info

MarketplaceAdvertiser.description: Represents one country inside a global account

AdPaymentsSellerPayablePaymentMethod.description: Represents Seller Payable payment method structure. Seller Payable is a type of payment method where spends are deducted from the seller balance of a particular seller account.

sellerAccountId.description: The seller account ID associated to this payment method

bulkGetBillingNotificationsRequestBody.description: The properties needed to get the billing notifications for a set of advertisers.
bulkGetBillingNotificationsRequestBody.title: Bulk Get Billing Notifications Request Body

Locale.description:
Preferred locale can be chosen among the list of valid language codes. Check the table below for supported language code.

**Supported Locales Table**
Locale code Language
en_US English
ja_JP Japanese
ar_SA Arabic
de_DE German
fr_FR French
it_IT Italian
es_MX Spanish
nl_NL Dutch
sv_SE Swedish
pl_PL Polish
tr_TR Turkish
pt_BR Portuguese

brand.description: The processor used to execute payments on the card, such as Visa, MasterCard, etc. Only valued for credit card payment methods.

instrumentId.description: Identifies a credit card or direct debit payment method.

priority.description: A numerical priority assigned to each payment method within a given profile, dictating the sequential order in which these payment methods are utilized during payment execution. Lower numerical values indicate higher priority, with the option possessing the lowest value being selected first.

sellerAccountId.description: The seller account ID associated to this payment method, only valued for seller payable payment methods.

tail.description: The last four digits of a credit card or bank account number.

vendorCode.description: The vendor code associated to this payment method, only valued for deduct from payment payment methods.

vendorCodeName.description: The name of the vendor code this payment method represents.

AdPaymentsPayInvoicesOutput.description: Represents the output of the pay invoices API.

AdPaymentsPaymentAgreementType.description: Enum defining different Payment Agreement types.

AdPaymentsAccountIdHeader.description: The header used to pass global account associated with the advertiser account. Use `GET` method on the Global Ads Account resource to list the global ads account associated with the access token passed in the HTTP Authorization header and choose `AdvertisingAccountIdentifier` id from the response to pass it as input.
AdPaymentsAccountIdHeader.name: Amazon-Ads-AccountId

AdPaymentsManagerAccountIdHeader.description: The header used to pass the ID of a manager account.  Use `GET` method on the Manager Accounts resource to list the manager accounts associated with the access token passed in the HTTP Authorization header and choose `managerAccountId` from the response to pass it as input.
AdPaymentsManagerAccountIdHeader.name: Amazon-Advertising-API-Manager-Account

AdPaymentsNextTokenQueryParam.description: To retrieve the next page of results, call the same operation and specify this token in the request. If the nextToken field is empty, there are no further results.
AdPaymentsNextTokenQueryParam.name: nextToken

oauth2AuthorizationCode.description: Login with Amazon. For more information see [Login with Amazon authorization code grant](https://developer.amazon.com/docs/login-with-amazon/authorization-code-grant.html).

scopes.cpc_advertising:campaign_management: Modify your advertising campaigns and access performance data
